document.full_text: within days of the arrest of former imf head dominique strauss-kahn on attempted rape and sexual abuse charges, details about the alleged victim appeared in publications around the world.
document.title: how french and u.s. laws affect strauss-kahn news coverage
lines_and_colors: within days of the arrest of former imf head dominique strauss-kahn on attempted rape and sexual abuse charges, details about the alleged victim appeared in publications around the world.
